episode_event_general_swsh_2021_solo/670: What’s wrong, Marnie? Something on your mind?

Yeah... You know how there are a lot of
sync pairs on Pasio?

I was thinking that if I became famous here, it
would help get people to know Spikemuth better.

*chuckle* You always go all-out when it comes to
your hometown, don’t you.
In that case, I might have an idea for you!

Why not challenge a bunch of sync pairs to some
Pokémon battles?

Say you battle a thousand sync pairs. You might
get a thousand fans while you’re at it!
Would it really be that easy, though?

Even the smallest sparks of passion can fire up a
large blaze!

Let’s do it! Let’s round up all of the sync pairs
from the Galar region and get Pasio all fired up!

All the sync pairs from Galar? That ups the scale
quite a bit.

But...I guess it might not be bad to be Marnie, the
Galar representative from Spikemuth!
So she’s doing this for Spikemuth, huh?

I’m not really a good Gym Leader... I s’ppose that
makes it hard on her.

[Name:PlayerNickname ], would you be willing
to help Marnie out? Consider it cheering her on.
episode_event_general_swsh_2021_solo/420:
If I do my best here
on Pasio...

and if I battle a lot here...it might help us put
Spikemuth an’ Galar on the map!

So, [Name:PlayerNickname ], help me with
something for a sec.
